entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Explicit call to `UseRouting()` may break some scenarios #58733
  • Correlation/Nonce cookies accummulated causing Nginx Request Header Or Cookie Too Large #58731
  • Using Blazor Web App template in dotnet 8. Upload component doesn't fire "onChange" event #58729
  • [StaticWebAssets] Design time support/contract for tooling #58728
    .NET 10 Planning
  • HttpNoContentOutputFormatter is not working when action is type of Task or void #58727
  • Improving current methods for setting OpenAPI response descriptions with Minimal APIs #58724
  • Enhance OpenAPI support in Minimal API with ProducesDefault for default responses #58723
  • Contributing docs for JetBrains Rider users #58722

Closed

  • .NET 8 migration from WASM to Blazor Web App - environment not set correctly #53832
    9.0.0
  • QuickGrid error: A second operation was started on this context instance before a previous operation completed #58669
  • Allow OpenAPI's response descriptions to be set using Minimal API #57963
  • [Blazor] css isolation does not work if the class is set to an element inside a loop #58540
  • Different model binding behaviour for nullable query params with default value in asp net core #57705

PullRequests

Created

  • Replaced Deprecated str.substr with str.substring in All Relevant Files #58732
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Provide analyzer for removing unneeded public partial class Program #58482
    analyzer, feature-mvc-testing, area-minimal, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/9.0] Prevent unnecessary debugger stops for user-unhandled exceptions in Blazor apps with Just My Code enabled #58573
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.1
  • [s390x] Fix Extensions.ApiDescription.Client tests on s390x #58235
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
